item.title: About 👋
item.author: wouter.brunenberg@hotmail.com (Wouter Brunenberg)
item.description: Hello! I’m Wouter Brunenberg, a software engineer with a passion for building scalable applications and exploring new technologies. Here’s a little more about my professional journey and interests. Background 🔎 I’m a software engineering student at Avans Hogeschool, diving into the world of full-stack development. I’ve discovered a genuine interest in the logic and structure that comes with the realm of back-end work. While I’m still relatively early in my programming journey, I feel confident that I’ve already gained a significant amount of knowledge.

item.title: Skills 📚
item.author: wouter.brunenberg@hotmail.com (Wouter Brunenberg)
item.description: Languages 👨‍💻 C# Advanced proficiency in C#, with a strong grasp of web development principles and a solid foundation in object-oriented programming and design patterns. Java Well-versed in Java, with a comprehensive understanding of core programming concepts and the ability to create rich interactive applications. PHP Proficient in PHP, with a strong capability for developing robust web applications and a solid understanding of modern frameworks to enhance development efficiency. SQL
